org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.player

Interface PlayerLeaveBedEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, EntityEvent, Event, GameEvent, HumanEvent, HumanLeaveBedEvent, HumanSleepEvent, LivingEvent, PlayerEvent, PlayerSleepEvent, UserEvent

    public interface PlayerLeaveBedEvent
extends HumanLeaveBedEvent, PlayerSleepEvent
    Called when a Player leaves a bed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Gets the spawn location of the player when leaving the bed.

      Sets the new spawn location of the player leaving the bed.

      Gets whether the spawn location for the player was set.

    • Method Detail

      • wasSpawnSet

        boolean wasSpawnSet()
        Gets whether the spawn location for the player was set.
        Specified by:
        wasSpawnSet in interface HumanLeaveBedEvent
        Returns:
        Whether the spawn location for the player was set

      • getSpawnLocation

        Optional<Location> getSpawnLocation()
        Gets the spawn location of the player when leaving the bed.

        This may have not been set by the event, so checking wasSpawnSet() is advisable. If spawn has not been set, it will return Optional.absent().

        Specified by:
        getSpawnLocation in interface HumanLeaveBedEvent
        Returns:
        The players new spawn location, if available

      • setSpawnLocation

        void setSpawnLocation(Location location)
        Sets the new spawn location of the player leaving the bed.

        If spawn wasSpawnSet() was not infact set by this event, this does not override the return value. The given spawn should be a valid location.

        Specified by:
        setSpawnLocation in interface HumanLeaveBedEvent
        Parameters:
        location - The new spawn location for the player
